entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:50 AM PDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 11:00 PM PDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: SSE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
